description: This file contains unit tests for the KeyValueType and TextKeyValueType classes, testing their basic functionality such as assignment, comparison, and key validation, using Google Test framework.

classes.name: KeyValueType
classes.description: A template class representing a key-value pair, with comparison and key validation methods.

classes.name: TextKeyValueType
classes.description: A template class representing a key-value pair with text fragments, supporting case sensitivity.

classes.name: TextFragment
classes.description: A class representing a fragment of text, used as key or value in text-based key-value pairs.

classes.name: OptionalType
classes.description: A template class representing an optional value, possibly used for nullable types.

methods.name: KeyValueType::Key
methods.description: Returns the key part of the key-value pair.

methods.name: KeyValueType::Value
methods.description: Returns the value part of the key-value pair.

methods.name: KeyValueType::IsKey
methods.description: Checks if a given string matches the key.

methods.name: TextKeyValueType::TextKeyValueType
methods.description: Constructor for TextKeyValueType, possibly default or parameterized.
